fingerprint.description: Cisco IP phone with serial number
Cisco IP Phone without serial number

fingerprint.example: CN=Cambium WLAN AP,OU=Products,O=Cambium Networks Inc,L=San Jose,ST=CA,C=US

fingerprint.description: Dell iDRAC Remote Access Controller w/MAC
Dell iDRAC Remote Access Controller w/Service Tag
Dell iDRAC Remote Access Controller w/o Service Tag

fingerprint.pattern: ^CN=(i?DRAC\d+) default certificate,OU=Remote Access Group,O=Dell Inc\.,L=Round Rock,ST=Texas,C=US$
fingerprint.description: Dell iDRAC Remote Access Controller w/Version
fingerprint.example: CN=iDRAC7 default certificate,OU=Remote Access Group,O=Dell Inc.,L=Round Rock,ST=Texas,C=US
CN=iDRAC6 default certificate,OU=Remote Access Group,O=Dell Inc.,L=Round Rock,ST=Texas,C=US
CN=DRAC5 default certificate,OU=Remote Access Group,O=Dell Inc.,L=Round Rock,ST=Texas,C=US

fingerprint.pattern: ^CN=iDRAC default certificate,OU=Server Firmware Group,O=Dell Inc\.,L=Round Rock,ST=Texas,C=US$
fingerprint.description: Dell iDRAC Remote Access Controller Default Certificate
fingerprint.example: CN=iDRAC default certificate,OU=Server Firmware Group,O=Dell Inc.,L=Round Rock,ST=Texas,C=US

fingerprint.pattern: ^CN=HP Service Processor,OU=UDU Service Tools,O=Hewlett-Packard Development Company\\, L\.P\.\\ ,L=Fremont,ST=California,C=US$
fingerprint.example: CN=HP Service Processor,OU=UDU Service Tools,O=Hewlett-Packard Development Company\, L.P.\ ,L=Fremont,ST=California,C=US

fingerprint.pattern: ^CN=([A-Za-z0-9\_\-\.]+),OU=Hewlett Packard Enterprise Network Management Software \(SMH\),O=Hewlett Packard Enterprise,L=Houston,ST=Texas,C=US$
fingerprint.example: CN=bigsrv99,OU=Hewlett Packard Enterprise Network Management Software (SMH),O=Hewlett Packard Enterprise,L=Houston,ST=Texas,C=US

fingerprint.pattern: ^CN=Oracle Integrated Lights Out Manager,O=Oracle America\\, Inc\.,L=Redwood Shores,ST=California,C=US$
fingerprint.example: CN=Oracle Integrated Lights Out Manager,O=Oracle America\, Inc.,L=Redwood Shores,ST=California,C=US
CN=C-series CIMC,OU=PID:UCSC-C220-M3S SERIAL:FCH18999AAA,O=Cisco Self Signed,L=San Jose,ST=California,C=US

fingerprint.description: HP Jet Direct - with host MAC and product

fingerprint.example: CN=device1133796-01b3e3fa.wd2go.com,OU=Domain Control Validated+OU=Hosted by Western Digital Corporation+OU=COMODO SSL Unified Communications

fingerprint.pattern: ^CN=([a-zA-Z0-9\.\-\_]+),OU=VMware ESX Server Default Certificate,O=VMware\\, Inc,L=Palo Alto,ST=California,C=US$
fingerprint.example: CN=server99.,OU=VMware ESX Server Default Certificate,O=VMware\, Inc,L=Palo Alto,ST=California,C=US
CN=Common Name (eg\, YOUR name),OU=Organizational Unit Name (eg\, section),O=CompanyName,L=Somecity,ST=Somewhere,C=US
